content.html:
Technical Notes:

1. For the purposes of 6A001.a.1.a.1.c, 'sounding resolution' is the swath width (degrees) divided by the maximum number of soundings per swath.

2. For the purposes of 6A001.a.1.a, 'enhancement' includes the ability to compensate by external means.
content.text: Technical Notes: 1. For the purposes of 6A001.a.1.a.1.c, 'sounding resolution' is the swath width (degrees) divided by the maximum number of soundings per swath. 2. For the purposes of 6A001.a.1.a, 'enhancement' includes the ability to compensate by external means.
